ca.ualberta.t14.gametrader

Class GameController

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.ualberta.t14.gametrader.GameController

  • public class GameController
extends java.lang.Object
    This is the Controller class for EditInventoryItemActivity. It provides methods to take input and make changes to the Game model.

    • Method Detail

      • createGame

        public Game createGame(User user)
        Creates a new game with given user and adds that created game into the user's inventory. To be used when user wants to create a game.
        Parameters:
        user - the user that receives the new game item.
        Returns:
        the Game object reference that was also passed into te inventory.

      • isOwner

        public java.lang.Boolean isOwner(Game game,
                        User user)
        Determines if the user given is the owner of that given game.
        Parameters:
        game - the game object to check ownership
        user - user to check against
        Returns:
        a boolean if the given user is the owner of the game or not.

      • editGame

        public void editGame(Game game,
            java.lang.String title,
            Bitmap picture,
            Game.Platform platform,
            Game.Condition condition,
            java.lang.Boolean sharableStatus,
            java.lang.String additionalInfo)
        It will update the Game's model with the new input received from the user.
        Parameters:
        game - The game that is to be updated.
        title - A new title for the Game.
        picture - A new picture for the Game.
        platform - A new platform for the Game.
        condition - A new condition for the Game.
        sharableStatus - Change sharable status to either Public or Private
        additionalInfo - New additional information for the game.

      • addPhoto

        public java.lang.Boolean addPhoto(Game game,
                         Bitmap img)
        Given game, it will add the bitmap given to the game.
        Parameters:
        game - the game to receive the image.
        img - the image to be added to the game
        Returns:
        returns false if the Bitmap supplied is invalid: has a height or width of 0;

      • manualDownloadPhoto

        public Bitmap manualDownloadPhoto(Game game)
        Manually force download the image from the network even if settings is set to don't download images.
        Parameters:
        game - The game that contains the image you want to force download.
        Returns:
        the bitmap from that game.

      • removeGame

        public void removeGame(Game game,
              User user)
        Removes specified game from the given user's inventory.
        Parameters:
        game - the game to be removed
        user - the user who's inventory he game is to be deleted from.
